name: Allrecipes
description: Find and share everyday cooking inspiration on Allrecipes. Discover recipes, cooks, videos, and how-tos based on the food you love and the friends you follow.

name: Budget Bytes
description: Over 1200 easy and delicious budget-friendly recipes to keep you full and happy! Dinner recipes, slow cooker recipes, vegetarian recipes, breakfast recipes, and more.

description: Find the best recipes for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. That means eggs, chicken, pasta, and everything else you can imagine.

name: Simply Recipes
description: Simply Recipes is here to help you cook delicious meals with less stress and more joy. We offer recipes and cooking advice for home cooks, by home cooks.
